# Trends and Patterns in DisneyPlus and Netflix TV Shows and Movies: A Comparative Analysis

## Introduction 

Disney+ and Netflix are two of the most popular streaming platforms globally, offering a wide range of TV shows and movies to millions of users. In this analysis, we conduct an exploratory data analysis (EDA) of the movies and TV shows available on Disney+ and Netflix. With the ever-evolving nature of digital entertainment, understanding how trends and patterns in content have shifted over time. 

In this analysis, we will explore key trends in Disney+ and Netflix content, including changes in the number of movies and TV shows over time, average durations, regional production distribution, content ratings, etc.This analysis will offer insights into content strategy, viewer preferences, and platform evolution, helping shape future content decisions and marketing strategies for Disney+ and Netflix.

## The broader research question for our analysis is : 
#### What trends and patterns can be observed in Disney Plus and Netflix TV shows and movies?
